application._info: If the listener is set to 'true', the oneDrive authentication process will be semi-manual, if it set to 'false', the oneDrive authentication process will be fully manual

oneDriveAuth._info: Keep 'refreshToken' blank ! This field will be filled when running 'npm run onedrive-authenticate'

oneDrive._info: Keep 'accesssToken' blank ! This field will be filled when running 'npm run onedrive-authenticate' The accessToken is valid only 1 hour !

googlePhotos._info: Keep 'authToken' blank ! This field will be filled when running 'npm run google-authenticate' The authToken is valid only 1 hour !
googlePhotos._info1: Keep 'albumId' blank ! This field will be fillder when running 'npm run google-authenticate' for the first time

googleApi._info: Keep 'refreshToken' blank ! This field will be filled when running 'npm run google-authenticate'

advanced._info: Don't touch unless you know what you're doing !
